articles.author: Bill Pennington
articles.title: Jon Rahm Wins the U.S. Open, His First Major Championship
articles.description: In his first tournament back after testing positive for the coronavirus, the Spaniard, 26, birded the final two holes to overtake Louis Oosthuizen, finishing at six under par.
articles.content: SAN DIEGO Jon Rahm on Sunday won the 121st U.S. Open, Americas national golf championship. The victory is Rahms first in a major championship and makes him the first Spaniard to win the event. It als… [+754 chars]

articles.description: The exhibition “Seeing the Invisible” will feature artists such as Ai Weiwei, El Anatsui and Sigalit Landau.

articles.title: G7 Live Updates: World Leaders Face Critical Climate Questions
articles.description: On the final day of the meeting of the world’s wealthiest large democracies, nations are working to reach consensus on plans to limit carbon emissions. President Biden will meet with Queen Elizabeth II later on Sunday.

articles.title: Global Tax Deal Reached Among G7 Nations
articles.description: The Group of 7 nations agreed to back a new minimum global minimum tax rate that companies would have to pay regardless of where they are based.

articles.title: America Is Driving the Global Economy. When Does That Become a Problem?
articles.description: New trade data suggests the outlook for the U.S. economy will depend in part on the rate of recovery of other nations.
